data_description.access_key_id: Access key ID to connect to S3 Compatible API
data_description.secret_access_key: Secret access key to connect to S3 Compatible API
data_description.bucket: Bucket must already exist and be writable by the provided credentials.
data_description.endpoint_url: Endpoint URL provided to S3 compatible API.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the S3 endpoint. Please check the URL and your network connectivity.
error.invalid_bucket_name: The specified bucket name is invalid or does not exist.
error.invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials or insufficient permissions. Please check your access key, secret key, and ensure the credentials have access to the specified bucket.
error.invalid_endpoint_url: Invalid endpoint URL. Please ensure it's a complete and valid URL for your S3 compatible service (e.g., https://s3.example.com).
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred while trying to set up the S3 compatible storage.
